metadata.description: This data is based on the modified radiosonde observation data of 2008 used by Chen et al. 2016, Chen et al. 2011 and Chen et al. 2013. The vertical resolution of the processed atmospheric wind speed, wind direction, temperature, relative humidity and pressure is 20m. The data of three observation stages in 2008 are processed, namely iop1, IOP2 and iop3. Iop1 started from February 25, 2008 to March 19, 2008, IOP2 from May 13, 2008 to June 12, 2008, and iop3 from July 7, 2008 to July 16, 2008.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据是基于Chen et al. 2016, Chen et al. 2011, Chen et al. 2013 所使用的2008年改则无线电探空观测数据基础之上再加工处理成的资料，加工的大气风速、风向、气温、相对湿度、气压的垂直分辨率为20m，共处理了2008年三个观测阶段的资料，即IOP1，IOP2和IOP3。IOP1从2008年2月25日开始到2008年3月19日，IOP2从2008年5月13日到6月12日，IOP3从2008年7月7日到7月16日，一天4次观测。原始无线电探空仪型号为Vaisala RS-92，原数据为每2s一条数据记录，根据Chen et al. 的文章需要对该资料采用高度等间距法对所有变量进行了线性插值。

background: The Tibetan Plateau (TP) has an average height of over 4000 m and an area of 2.5 million km² and exerts a profound thermal and dynamic influence on the Asian monsoon and global weather and climate. Due to the low air density and the strong solar radiation, the TP allows more energy from the surface, directly heating the middle troposphere. The exchange between upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS) was found over the Tibetan Plateau. As a huge elevated heating source, a rigorous deep convection area, a dynamical pumping and sucking unit, and westerly jet above it, the TP generates an active stratosphere and troposphere exchange (STE) region, forming a short-circuit and pathway for the STE. Due to a lack of high resolution observational data, the structure of the UTLS above the Tibetan Plateau is still insufficiently understood. The occurrence of multiple tropopauses (MT) plays a central role in the structure and features of the tropopause layer which plays a crucial role in the exchange between the troposphere and stratosphere above the TP. Tropopause folds are the key feature and favourable structures for cross-tropopause exchange in the subtropics. The Tibetan Plateau is situated at 28° N–38° N, a region which is significantly influenced by the subtropical jet stream as it moves northward from winter to summer. Due to the high frequency of tropopause folds, stratosphere intrusions should frequently happen over the Plateau.
research objective: This paper reports, on the basis of these observations, on an analysis of the structure of upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS) and provides observations of stratosphere and troposphere exchange (STE) over the TP. The present paper presents statistics of MT and STE events above the Tibetan Plateau based on high resolution sonde data for the first time. This study will contribute to characteristics of MT events using the most advanced radiosonde data in this area.
challenges: Due to sparseness of high resolution radiosonde data, many previous studies assumed that there was only one thermal tropopause over the TP. Due to a lack of high resolution observational data, the structure of the UTLS above the Tibetan Plateau is still insufficiently understood. The variation of the stratospheric intrusions and their influence on the vertical ozone distribution need further analyses.
methods: In order to understand the atmosphere heating and water vapour variations over the TP during different phases of the monsoon, the Sino-Japan joint cooperation project was carried out to collect intensive radiosonde observations in 2008. Three sites, Gerze, Litang and Dali, were equipped with a Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS radiosonding system. The radiosondes used were Vaisala RS92 calibrated with local meteorological measurements before releasing. The sounding data contained profiles of temperature, pressure, relative humidity, horizontal wind speed and direction. The radiosonde transmits data to the receiver every 2 s. With an average 5 m s⁻¹ ascending speed, the obtained vertical resolution of the data is about 10 m. The other six sites employed the Chinese meteorological radiosonde system.
dataset: A set of high resolution radiosonde data above the Tibetan Plateau is used to analyse the thermal tropopause characters.
findings: Our analyses show that the frequency and seasonal variation of MT events are high during winter. The MT occurrences of the three Plateau stations (Gerze, Nagqu, and Litang) for IOP1 are as high as from 72.5% to 84%. The MT frequencies of all the Plateau stations during IOP3 are the lowest compared to the other two periods. This result supports the conclusion of MT occurring in wintertime with a high frequency over the Plateau, which is similar to previous climatological studies.
backgroundCn: 青藏高原（TP）平均海拔超过4000米，面积达250万平方公里，对亚洲季风和全球天气气候产生深远的热力和动力影响。由于空气密度低和强烈的太阳辐射，青藏高原允许更多的地表能量直接加热中层对流层。研究发现，上层对流层与下层平流层（UTLS）之间的交换在青藏高原上发生。作为一个巨大的高海拔加热源，严格的深对流区、动力抽吸单元以及其上方的西风急流，青藏高原形成了一个活跃的平流层与对流层交换（STE）区域，形成了一个短路和通道用于STE。由于缺乏高分辨率的观测数据，青藏高原上方的UTLS结构仍然不够清楚。多个对流层顶的出现（MT）在对流层顶层的结构和特征中发挥着核心作用，而对流层顶层在青藏高原上方的对流层与平流层之间的交换中起着至关重要的作用。对流层顶褶皱是亚热带地区跨对流层交换的关键特征和有利结构。青藏高原位于28°N–38°N，受亚热带急流显著影响，该急流在冬季向夏季移动时向北移动。由于对流层顶褶皱的高频率，平流层入侵在高原上应频繁发生。
research objectiveCn: 本文基于这些观察，分析了上对流层和下平流层（UTLS）的结构，并提供了关于青藏 Plateau（TP）上平流层和对流层交换（STE）的观察。本文首次基于高分辨率探空数据呈现了青藏 Plateau 上的 MT 和 STE 事件的统计数据。本研究将利用该地区最先进的探空数据，贡献于 MT 事件的特征分析。
challengesCn: 由于高分辨率气象探空数据的稀缺，许多先前的研究假设在青藏 Plateau 上只有一个热层顶。由于缺乏高分辨率观测数据，青藏 Plateau 上的UTLS结构仍然不够清楚。平流层入侵的变化及其对垂直臭氧分布的影响需要进一步分析。
methodsCn: 为了了解青藏高原不同季节的气候加热和水汽变化，中日联合合作项目于2008年开展了密集的探空观测。三个站点，分别是格尔泽、理塘和大理，配备了Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS探空系统。使用的探空仪为Vaisala RS92，在释放前已根据当地气象测量进行校准。探空数据包含温度、气压、相对湿度、水平风速和风向的剖面数据。探空仪每2秒向接收器传输一次数据。以平均5 m s⁻¹的上升速度获得的数据的垂直分辨率约为10米。其他六个站点则采用了中国气象探空系统。
datasetCn: 一组高分辨率的气球探空数据用于分析青藏 Plateau 上的热对流层特征。
findingsCn: 我们的分析显示，MT事件的频率和季节变化在冬季较高。三个高原站点（格尔泽、那曲和理塘）在IOP1期间的MT发生率高达72.5%到84%。在IOP3期间，所有高原站点的MT频率是三个时期中最低的。这个结果支持了MT在冬季在高原地区高频发生的结论，这与之前的气候学研究相似。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to study the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS) over the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于研究青藏高原上层对流层和下层平流层（UTLS）的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method is the use of intensive radiosonde observations, where sites such as Gerze, Litang, and Dali were equipped with a Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS radiosonding system. Radiosondes used were Vaisala RS92, calibrated with local meteorological measurements before release, and transmitted data every 2 seconds.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法是使用密集的探空观测，像格尔泽、理塘和大理等地点配备了Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS探空系统。使用的探空仪为Vaisala RS92，在释放前与当地气象测量进行校准，并每2秒传输一次数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when collecting high-resolution radiosonde data over the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 在收集青藏 Plateau 上的高分辨率探空数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in collecting high-resolution radiosonde data is the sparseness of such data, which has led many previous studies to assume only one thermal tropopause over the Tibetan Plateau, highlighting the insufficient understanding of the UTLS structure.
Example.AnswerCn: 收集高分辨率的探空数据面临的一个挑战是数据的稀疏性，这导致许多先前的研究假设青藏高原只有一个热对流层顶，突显了对UTLS结构理解的不足。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a dataset used to analyze the structure of the tropopause layer over the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于分析青藏 Plateau 上的对流层顶层结构的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset example is the high-resolution radiosonde data collected above the Tibetan Plateau, used to analyze the thermal tropopause characteristics and the frequency of multiple tropopauses (MT) events in this region.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个数据集的例子是收集于青藏 Plateau 上的高分辨率气象探空数据，用于分析该地区的热对流层顶特征和多重对流层顶（MT）事件的频率。

Definition.QuestionEn: How does the use of Vaisala RS-92 radiosondes contribute to the accuracy of atmospheric data collection over the Tibetan Plateau?
Definition.QuestionCn: 使用Vaisala RS-92无线电探空仪如何提高在青藏高原进行大气数据收集的准确性？
Definition.AnswerEn: The Vaisala RS-92 radiosondes contribute to the accuracy of atmospheric data collection by providing high-resolution measurements of key atmospheric variables every 2 seconds. These radiosondes are known for their precision in capturing profiles of temperature, pressure, relative humidity, and wind parameters. Additionally, calibrating them with local meteorological measurements before deployment enhances their reliability, which is crucial for understanding the complex atmospheric dynamics over the Tibetan Plateau.
Definition.AnswerCn: Vaisala RS-92 探空仪通过每 2 秒提供关键大气变量的高分辨率测量，促进了大气数据收集的准确性。这些探空仪以其在捕捉温度、压力、相对湿度和风参数的剖面方面的精确性而闻名。此外，在部署前与当地气象测量进行校准，增强了它们的可靠性，这对于理解青藏高原复杂的大气动态至关重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with the sparseness of high-resolution radiosonde data in atmospheric research, particularly over regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在大气研究中，与高分辨率无线电探空仪数据稀疏相关的挑战是什么，特别是在像青藏高原这样的地区？
Definition.AnswerEn: The sparseness of high-resolution radiosonde data presents challenges such as limited understanding of the complex atmospheric phenomena occurring over regions like the Tibetan Plateau. This can lead to assumptions like the presence of only one thermal tropopause, potentially overlooking multiple tropopauses and their role in stratosphere-troposphere exchange. The lack of data also hinders the analysis of variations in stratospheric intrusions and their impact on vertical ozone distribution, necessitating more comprehensive data collection efforts.
Definition.AnswerCn: 高分辨率的气象探空数据稀疏带来了挑战，例如对像青藏 Plateau 这样的地区复杂大气现象的理解有限。这可能导致假设只有一个热层顶的存在，从而可能忽视多个热层顶及其在平流层-对流层交换中的作用。数据的缺乏也妨碍了对平流层入侵变化及其对垂直臭氧分布影响的分析，这需要更全面的数据收集工作。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods used in the Sino-Japan joint cooperation project for radiosonde observations compare to those employed by the Chinese meteorological radiosonde system in terms of equipment and calibration?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 中日联合合作项目在探空仪观测中使用的数据收集方法与中国气象探空仪系统在设备和校准方面的比较如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The Sino-Japan joint cooperation project used a Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS radiosonding system with Vaisala RS92 radiosondes, which were calibrated with local meteorological measurements before release. The Chinese meteorological radiosonde system was used at other sites, but specific details about their equipment and calibration process are not provided in the field information.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 中日联合合作项目使用了Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS 气象探空系统，配备Vaisala RS92 气象探空仪，在释放前进行了当地气象测量的校准。中国气象探空系统在其他地点使用，但未提供其设备和校准过程的具体细节。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data resolution and frequency between the high resolution radiosonde data collected for the Tibetan Plateau study and typical radiosonde data used in other atmospheric studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 高分辨率气象探空数据与其他大气研究中使用的典型气象探空数据在数据分辨率和频率上有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The high resolution radiosonde data for the Tibetan Plateau study was collected with an average vertical resolution of about 10 m, with data transmitted every 2 seconds. This level of resolution is higher than typical radiosonde data, which may not provide such frequent data transmission or fine vertical resolution.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 用于青藏高原研究的高分辨率探空仪数据的平均垂直分辨率约为10米，数据每2秒传输一次。这种分辨率高于典型的探空仪数据，后者可能没有如此频繁的数据传输或细致的垂直分辨率。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of understanding the UTLS structure over the Tibetan Plateau differ from those encountered in other regions with less complex topography and atmospheric dynamics?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 理解青藏 Plateau 上 UTLS 结构的挑战与其他地形复杂性和大气动态较少的地区所遇到的挑战有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The challenges over the Tibetan Plateau include the sparseness of high resolution observational data and the complex dynamics involving multiple tropopauses and frequent stratospheric intrusions. These challenges are compounded by the Plateau's high elevation and influence of the subtropical jet stream, which may not be as prominent in regions with less complex topography and atmospheric dynamics.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 青藏高原面临的挑战包括高分辨率观测数据的稀缺以及涉及多个对流层顶和频繁平流层入侵的复杂动态。这些挑战因高原的高海拔和副热带急流的影响而加剧，而在地形和大气动态较为简单的地区，这种影响可能并不明显。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways could the seasonal variation of multiple tropopause events, as observed over the Tibetan Plateau, inform future data collection strategies or methodologies?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 多重平流层事件在季节变化中的观察，特别是在青藏高原地区，如何为未来的数据收集策略或方法论提供信息？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The observed seasonal variation of multiple tropopause events, with higher frequencies during winter, suggests that future data collection strategies should consider seasonal timing to capture these events more effectively. This could involve increasing the frequency of radiosonde launches or employing additional observational techniques during periods of high occurrence to better understand the conditions and dynamics leading to these events.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 观察到的多重平流层事件的季节变化，冬季频率较高，这表明未来的数据收集策略应考虑季节时机，以更有效地捕捉这些事件。这可能涉及在高发生率期间增加探空仪的发射频率或采用其他观测技术，以更好地理解导致这些事件的条件和动态。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the lack of high-resolution observational data over the Tibetan Plateau, and how do they affect the understanding of stratosphere and troposphere exchange (STE)?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致对青藏 Plateau 缺乏高分辨率观测数据的因素有哪些，这些因素如何影响对平流层和对流层交换（STE）的理解？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The sparseness of high-resolution radiosonde data is a major factor contributing to the insufficient understanding of the UTLS structure above the Tibetan Plateau. This lack of data has led many previous studies to assume only one thermal tropopause over the TP, impacting the analysis of stratosphere and troposphere exchange.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 高分辨率的探空数据稀疏是导致对青藏 Plateau 上的 UTLS 结构理解不足的主要因素。这种数据的缺乏使得许多先前的研究假设青藏 Plateau 只有一个热层顶，从而影响了对平流层和对流层交换的分析。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of using high-resolution radiosonde data for analyzing the stratosphere and troposphere exchanges over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用高分辨率探空数据分析青藏高原上层大气和对流层之间的交换可能产生的结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of high-resolution radiosonde data can provide detailed observations of stratosphere and troposphere exchanges (STE) and help in understanding the structure of the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS) over the Tibetan Plateau. This can lead to better statistics of multiple tropopauses (MT) events and enhance the understanding of their characteristics in this region.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 高分辨率的探空仪数据可以提供对平流层和对流层交换（STE）的详细观测，并有助于理解青藏高原上层对流层和下层平流层（UTLS）的结构。这可以提高多重对流层顶（MT）事件的统计数据，并增强对该地区这些事件特征的理解。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise from the sparseness of high-resolution data in understanding the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere dynamics over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在理解青藏 Plateau 上层对流层和下层平流层动力学时，缺乏高分辨率数据可能会带来哪些挑战？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The sparseness of high-resolution data can lead to assumptions such as the existence of only one thermal tropopause over the Tibetan Plateau, limiting the understanding of the UTLS structure. It also poses challenges in analyzing the variation of stratospheric intrusions and their impact on the vertical ozone distribution, requiring further analysis.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 高分辨率数据的稀疏性可能导致一些假设，例如在青藏高原上仅存在一个热带对流层顶，这限制了对UTLS结构的理解。它还对分析平流层入侵的变化及其对垂直臭氧分布的影响提出了挑战，需进一步分析。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of employing different radiosonde systems on data consistency and resolution when observing atmospheric conditions over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在观察青藏 Plateau 的大气条件时，采用不同的探空系统对数据一致性和分辨率的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using different radiosonde systems, such as the Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS radiosonding system and the Chinese meteorological radiosonde system, could impact data consistency and resolution. The Vaisala system provides a vertical resolution of about 10 m and is calibrated with local meteorological measurements, which might offer more precise data compared to other systems, potentially affecting the analysis of atmospheric conditions over the Tibetan Plateau.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用不同的探空系统，如Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS探空系统和中国气象探空系统，可能会影响数据的一致性和分辨率。Vaisala系统提供约10米的垂直分辨率，并与当地气象测量进行校准，这可能提供比其他系统更精确的数据，从而影响对青藏高原大气条件的分析。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of collecting high-resolution radiosonde data for analyzing the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere over the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集高分辨率探空数据以分析青藏 Plateau 上的上对流层和下平流层的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives include analyzing the structure of the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS) and providing observations of stratosphere and troposphere exchange (STE) over the Tibetan Plateau. This effort aims to contribute to the understanding of multiple tropopauses (MT) and STE events using advanced radiosonde data, filling gaps in previous studies due to the lack of high-resolution observational data.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标包括分析对流层上部和平流层下部（UTLS）的结构，并提供对青藏高原上平流层和对流层交换（STE）的观测。这项工作旨在利用先进的探空数据，帮助理解多重对流层顶（MT）和STE事件，填补由于缺乏高分辨率观测数据而导致的先前研究中的空白。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to study the seasonal variations and frequency of multiple tropopause events over the Tibetan Plateau using collected data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么使用收集的数据研究青藏高原上多重对流层顶事件的季节变化和频率很重要？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Studying the seasonal variations and frequency of multiple tropopause events is important as it helps understand the exchange between the troposphere and stratosphere above the Tibetan Plateau. It also provides insights into the occurrence of stratospheric intrusions and their influence on the vertical ozone distribution, which is crucial because of the region's unique position and influence on the subtropical jet stream and global climate.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 研究多个平流层顶事件的季节变化和频率非常重要，因为这有助于理解青藏高原上对流层和平流层之间的交换。它还提供了对平流层入侵事件及其对垂直臭氧分布影响的见解，这一点至关重要，因为该地区在亚热带急流和全球气候中具有独特的位置和影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What challenges do researchers face in collecting and analyzing high-resolution observational data over the Tibetan Plateau, and how can these be addressed?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 研究人员在收集和分析青藏高原的高分辨率观测数据时面临哪些挑战，以及如何解决这些问题？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Researchers face challenges such as the sparseness of high-resolution radiosonde data and the assumption of a single thermal tropopause in previous studies. Addressing these challenges involves deploying advanced radiosonde systems and ensuring data calibration with local meteorological measurements to improve the accuracy and resolution of collected data, thus enhancing the understanding of UTLS structures and tropopause events over the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 研究人员面临的挑战包括高分辨率气象探测数据的稀缺以及以往研究中对单一热层顶的假设。解决这些挑战需要部署先进的气象探测系统，并确保与当地气象测量的数据校准，以提高收集数据的准确性和分辨率，从而增强对该地区UTLS结构和热层顶事件的理解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are followed to ensure the accuracy of radiosonde data collection for atmospheric studies over the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保对青藏 Plateau 大气研究的探空仪数据收集的准确性，遵循了哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedures involve calibrating the Vaisala RS92 radiosondes with local meteorological measurements before release, ensuring accurate data collection of temperature, pressure, relative humidity, and wind speed and direction with a vertical resolution of about 10 m.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 这些程序涉及在释放之前对Vaisala RS92探空仪进行本地气象测量的校准，以确保准确收集温度、压力、相对湿度以及风速和风向的数据，垂直分辨率约为10米。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the interpolation of atmospheric variables like wind speed, temperature, and humidity conducted to achieve a 20m vertical resolution in datasets derived from radiosonde observations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何对来自探空观测的数据进行插值，以实现20米的垂直分辨率，涉及到风速、温度和湿度等大气变量的插值？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The interpolation is achieved using a linear interpolation method based on the height of the observations, allowing for a consistent 20m vertical resolution across the dataset.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 插值是通过基于观测高度的线性插值方法实现的，确保整个数据集具有一致的20米垂直分辨率。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What challenges are considered when designing data collection methods for studying the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere over the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在设计用于研究青藏 Plateau 上层对流层和下层平流层的数据收集方法时，需要考虑哪些挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Challenges include the sparsity of high-resolution radiosonde data, the complex structure of the UTLS, and the need to understand variations in stratospheric intrusions and their impact on vertical ozone distribution.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 挑战包括高分辨率气象探空数据的稀疏性、UTLS（对流层顶和低层平流层）结构的复杂性，以及需要理解平流层侵入的变化及其对垂直臭氧分布的影响。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data collection techniques are employed to gather high-resolution atmospheric data over the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在青藏 Plateau 上收集高分辨率大气数据采用了哪些数据收集技术？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The data collection techniques include using Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS radiosonding systems at three sites, with Vaisala RS92 radiosondes calibrated with local meteorological measurements. The radiosondes transmit data every 2 seconds, providing profiles of temperature, pressure, relative humidity, and horizontal wind speed and direction.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据收集技术包括在三个地点使用Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS探空系统，配备Vaisala RS92探空仪，并根据当地气象测量进行校准。这些探空仪每2秒传输一次数据，提供温度、气压、相对湿度以及水平风速和风向的剖面数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges exist in collecting high-resolution radiosonde data over the Tibetan Plateau, and how are these challenges addressed?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在收集青藏 Plateau 高分辨率的探空数据时，存在哪些挑战，以及如何应对这些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include the sparseness of high-resolution radiosonde data and the insufficient understanding of the UTLS structure due to a lack of data. These are addressed by conducting intensive radiosonde observations as part of a Sino-Japan joint cooperation project, aiming to provide detailed data for analysis.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括高分辨率气象探空数据的稀疏性以及由于数据不足对UTLS结构的理解不够深入。为了解决这些问题，作为中日联合合作项目的一部分，进行密集的气象探空观测，旨在提供详细的数据以供分析。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of local meteorological measurements enhance the accuracy of data collected by radiosondes over the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 当地气象测量的整合如何提高在青藏高原上收集的探空仪数据的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Integration of local meteorological measurements enhances accuracy by calibrating the Vaisala RS92 radiosondes before release, ensuring that the data collected reflects local atmospheric conditions accurately.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 当地气象测量的整合通过在释放前对Vaisala RS92探空仪进行校准，提高了准确性，确保所收集的数据准确反映当地大气条件。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might high-resolution radiosonde data be particularly challenging to collect over the Tibetan Plateau?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 高分辨率的探空仪数据在青藏高原上收集可能特别具有挑战性，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Due to the sparseness of high-resolution radiosonde data, many previous studies faced challenges in accurately understanding the UTLS structure over the Tibetan Plateau. The region's elevation and complex atmospheric dynamics add further difficulties to data collection efforts.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于高分辨率的气象探测数据稀缺，许多先前的研究在准确理解青藏 Plateau 上的 UTLS 结构方面面临挑战。该地区的高海拔和复杂的大气动力学进一步增加了数据收集的难度。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected challenges in analyzing the vertical ozone distribution over the Tibetan Plateau with available observational data?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 分析青藏高原垂直臭氧分布时，预期会面临哪些挑战，尤其是利用现有的观测数据？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The variation of stratospheric intrusions and their influence on the vertical ozone distribution need further analyses. This challenge is compounded by the limited high-resolution observational data available for the Tibetan Plateau.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 平流层侵入的变化及其对垂直臭氧分布的影响需要进一步分析。这个挑战因可用于青藏高原的高分辨率观测数据有限而加剧。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the impact of using high resolution radiosonde data on understanding the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere dynamics over the Tibetan Plateau?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您将如何评估使用高分辨率无线电探空数据对理解青藏高原上对流层上部和平流层下部动态的影响？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of high resolution radiosonde data is crucial for accurately analyzing the structure of the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere over the Tibetan Plateau. Such data allows for detailed observations of stratosphere and troposphere exchange, which are essential for understanding the thermal and dynamic processes in this region. The high vertical resolution of the radiosonde data enables researchers to capture the nuances of multiple tropopauses and stratospheric intrusions, which were previously not well understood due to the lack of data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 高分辨率的探空仪数据对于准确分析青藏高原上层对流层和下层平流层的结构至关重要。这些数据允许对平流层和对流层之间的交换进行详细观察，这对于理解该地区的热力学和动力学过程是必不可少的。探空仪数据的高垂直分辨率使研究人员能够捕捉多个对流层顶和平流层入侵的细微差别，这在以往由于缺乏数据而未能很好理解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the techniques used to ensure the accuracy and calibration of radiosonde data in high-altitude regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对确保高空地区探空仪数据准确性和校准所使用的技术不太确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The radiosondes used were Vaisala RS92, which were calibrated with local meteorological measurements before releasing. The data is transmitted every 2 seconds, providing a high vertical resolution of about 10 meters.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 使用的探空仪是Vaisala RS92，在释放之前与当地气象测量进行了校准。数据每2秒传输一次，提供了大约10米的高垂直分辨率。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't understand the challenges faced in obtaining high-resolution observational data for analyzing the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere over the Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解在获取高分辨率观测数据以分析青藏 Plateau 上的上对流层和下平流层时面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The sparseness of high-resolution radiosonde data has been a challenge, leading many previous studies to assume only one thermal tropopause exists over the Tibetan Plateau. The lack of high-resolution data has also limited the understanding of the structure of the UTLS in this region.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 高分辨率的气象探空数据稀缺一直是一个挑战，这导致许多先前的研究假设在青藏高原上只有一个热对流层顶。高分辨率数据的缺乏也限制了对该地区UTLS结构的理解。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe a method for collecting high-resolution atmospheric data over complex terrain like the Tibetan Plateau, including the types of instruments that may be used.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述一种在复杂地形（如青藏高原）上收集高分辨率大气数据的方法，包括可能使用的仪器类型。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: In order to collect high-resolution atmospheric data over the Tibetan Plateau, radiosonde systems such as the Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS radiosonding system can be used. This system involves deploying Vaisala RS92 radiosondes, which are calibrated with local meteorological measurements before release. The radiosonde transmits data every 2 seconds, and with an average ascending speed of 5 m s⁻¹, it provides a vertical resolution of about 10 m. This method captures profiles of temperature, pressure, relative humidity, and horizontal wind speed and direction.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 为了收集青藏高原的高分辨率大气数据，可以使用如Vaisala DigiCORA III GPS无线电探空系统等无线电探空系统。该系统涉及在释放前使用当地气象测量对Vaisala RS92无线电探空仪进行校准。无线电探空仪每2秒传输一次数据，平均上升速度为5米每秒，因此提供约10米的垂直分辨率。这种方法捕获温度、压力、相对湿度以及水平风速和风向的剖面数据。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify challenges associated with analyzing the structure of the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS) over the Tibetan Plateau.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 识别与分析青藏高原上层对流层和下层平流层（UTLS）结构相关的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: One challenge in analyzing the UTLS structure over the Tibetan Plateau is the sparseness of high-resolution radiosonde data, which has led many previous studies to assume only one thermal tropopause in the region. Furthermore, understanding the variation of stratospheric intrusions and their influence on vertical ozone distribution requires additional high-resolution observational data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 分析青藏 Plateau 上的 UTLS 结构的一大挑战是高分辨率气象探测数据的稀缺，这导致许多先前的研究假设该地区只有一个热层顶。此外，理解平流层入侵的变化及其对垂直臭氧分布的影响需要更多高分辨率的观测数据。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please elaborate on potential datasets that could be used to analyze stratosphere-troposphere exchange events over elevated regions like the Tibetan Plateau.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请详细说明可以用于分析高原地区（如青藏 Plateau）对流层-平流层交换事件的潜在数据集。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: A potential dataset for analyzing stratosphere-troposphere exchange events over the Tibetan Plateau includes high-resolution radiosonde data. This dataset contains observations from intensive radiosonde measurements collected during a Sino-Japan joint cooperation project in 2008, covering profiles of temperature, pressure, relative humidity, and wind speed and direction. It provides insights into the thermal tropopause characteristics and the seasonal variation of multiple tropopause events.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 一个潜在的数据集用于分析青藏 Plateau 上的平流层-对流层交换事件，包括高分辨率的探空数据。该数据集包含在2008年中日联合合作项目期间收集的密集探空测量观测，涵盖温度、压力、相对湿度以及风速和风向的剖面。它提供了对热平流层特征和多次平流层事件季节变化的洞察。
